m_szDocTitle: Honda Partnering With GM On Plug-in Hybrid Cars - Gas 2
m_szDocSumamry: Honda Partnering With GM On Plug-in Hybrid Cars January 8th, 2016 by Steve Hanley     Honda and General Motors are already working together on hydrogen fuel cell technology. Now, they are prepared to expand their working relationship to focus also on plug-in hybrid cars. While EV enthusiasts decline to recognize plug-ins as real electric cars, most manufacturers see them as the bridge between the conventional cars of today and the zero emissions battery electric cars of the future. The International Energy Agency estimates that plug-in hybrids will account for 5% of new car sales worldwide in
